A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not a Star Wars fan-boy - I enjoyed the movie\, though it was evident there were so many individual stories\, where it did not seem to be much depth. The funny quips seems too blatant and obvious\, they did not flow. I will watch it again\, but it seemed to be a tale of \"what will with viewers want vs. what could actually happen\" in many cases. The biggest being Finn driving to the large opening device and not driving straight into it\, instead of being saved...
